para_sentences.para_0: Backtracking is a good paradigm to know to be able to solve couple of interesting problems like N-Queen or Sudoku. The greedy algorithm enables us to come up with an efficient algorithm to solve some problems.
para_sentences.para_1: In question 1, you will implement a backtracking algorithm to solve a problem. (MLO1)
para_sentences.para_2: In question 2, you will implement a greedy technique to solve a problem. (MLO3)

para_sentences.para_0: Download the assignment questions from this assignment file.
You will turn in the submission files via Canvas and Gradescope.
para_sentences.para_1: All your answers other than python code files  will be turned in through Canvas assignment in a pdf file.
para_sentences.para_2: The python files to be submitted on Gradescope:

ol_0: Implement a backtracking algorithm [10 points]  Describe a backtracking algorithm [2 point] Implementation [7 points] Time complexity [1 point]
Implement a Greedy algorithm [10 points]  Describe a greedy algorithm [2 point] Implementation [6 points] Time complexity [2 point]
